level.heading: Authority of the Chief Financial Officer.
level.text: The Chief Financial Officer of the District of Columbia shall exercise authority over the Corporation consistent with §§ 1-204.24a through 1- 204.24f.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 19-171 validated a previously made technical correction.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 19-21, see notes under § 44-951.01.
For history of Law 19-171, see notes under § 44-407.
